s.text: Any fancy effect you do in the editing--wipes, dissolves, superimpositions--won't have to be transferred to film (which is what costs a fortune).

I don't care if they'e rocket scientists in life or not--on screen they seem so smart.

(David O. Russell made his great Spanking The Monkey on "short ends" snatched up by his wife, Janet Grillo, then a New Line executive.)
